entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: E 5 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
